abstract: Conciliatory statements were made less than two weeks after a Boston affiliate said it opposed running Jay Leno’s new 10 p.m. show.
snippet: Conciliatory statements were made less than two weeks after a Boston affiliate said it opposed running Jay Leno’s new 10 p.m. show.
lead_paragraph: The duel in Boston between NBC and its affiliated station there, WHDH, over the future of Jay Leno’s new prime-time program ended without economic bloodshed Monday, less than two weeks after it started.

headline.main: Boston Station Decides to Run Leno’s New Show After All
headline.print_headline: Boston Station Decides to Run Leno’s New Show After All
